data.meta_site_name: Robert Lowry Obituary | June 19, 2023 | Walker Funeral Homes - Mt. Healthy, OH
data.text:
Robert Lowry

April 20, 1971 - June 19, 2023

It is with sadness we announce the transition of Robert Lowry, age 52, of Fairfield, Ohio, who entered eternal rest on Monday, June 19, 2023, in Columbus, Ohio. He was born on April 20, 1971, in Cincinnati, Ohio.

Visitation is from 10:00 am until 11:00 am, on Wednesday, July 5, 2023, at the Walker Funeral Home - Mt. Healthy, 7272 Hamilton Avenue , Mt. Healthy (45231). The funeral service will immediately follow the visitation beginning at 11:00 am.

Interment will follow at Oak Hill Cemetery.

To share a memory of Robert or leave a special message for the Lowry family, please click the "Tribute Wall" tab above and to the right, enter the information, and click "Save Post."

Herbert T. Walker III and Walker Funeral Home, 2625 Gilbert Avenue, Cincinnati (45206) are honored to serve the Lowry family. Please call 513.251.6200 or visit www.HerbWalker.com for additional information.
